#summary Frequently Asked Questions about the TokBox Call Widget API

== Getting Started ==

==== Where can I get Help? ====
  * Post a message to the the <a href="http://groups.google.com/group/tokbox-developers">Call Widget Developers group</a>.

==== How do I get an API Key? ====
  * TokBox is no longer allowing for keys to be generated against the Call Widget API. Please instead use our new OpenTok API which you can find more information about at [http://www.tokbox.com/opentok]

====Can I use TokBox on my site without programming / API Keys====
  * Absolutely. You can generate a simple embed. Please go to [http://www.tokbox.com/] to find out more
